author: sussman
msg: Once again, the commit process says it's sending the directory
propchange, but after the commit, my wc thinks the local mod is still
there.  And the propchange never reaches the repository.
* trunk:  [unrelated] add 'apr-util' to svn:ignore property.

author: sussman
msg: Beginning of some work on 'svn switch single-file'.  Still not working
right, as mentioned in email.
* switch.c (svn_client_switch): treat file and directory as separate
cases now.  In dir case, anchor the update-editor right on the
wc-path.  In file case, do an anchor/target split.
* switch-cmd.c (svn_cl__switch): same change -- only do anchor/target
split if the wc-path is a file.
* ra_plugin.c (do_switch): if the 'target' passed in is non-NULL, then
anchor the pipe-editor on the parent dir, because presumably the
update-editor is anchored the same way.  Gotta keep them in sync.
* trunk:  [unrelated] add 'apr-util' to svn:ignore property.

author: philip
msg: Enable configure to find apr and apr-util when builddir != srcdir
* ac-helpers/apr.m4: look for apr in $srcdir explicitly
* ac-helpers/aprutil.m4: look for apr-util in $srcdir explicitly

author: gstein
msg: Add information about apr-util.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Took out patches to install procedure now not
required because of fixes in rev 1130.  Thanks!
